website_summaries.verdict: A cover with some extra features to keep the fit tight and secure around many different grills.
pros: Side-closure straps keep a tighter grip around the grill than other grill covers
Fabric is flexible enough to drape over the grill without too much fuss
cons: Some assembly is required once it is out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: The grill cover fits my grill very nicely. It has handled our rather harsh northeastern winters very well so far. Due to living in an apartment the first winter we had the grill and the cover, it was all left outside under a covered porch. It protected my grill so well, that in the spring, when we moved to our home, I couldn't even tell that the grill, or the cover, was outside over the winter. Very durable product that I have no issue recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Baking GirlTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Well worth picking up and really happy with how it fits
customer_reviews.text: After having trouble with rust on my previous grill I decided to pick up a cover for my new one. This cover is huge. New grill is a four burner with a side burner and a side shelf on the other side and it fits perfectly. Well worth picking up and really happy with how it fits. Only downside is if your grill sits in the sun, the cover holds the heat in so the metal on your grill will get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: gonzotgreat23

customer_reviews.title: Adequate protection with thoughtful features.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of thick, durable material that easily covers a five burner Char-Broil gas grill. I appreciate the logo printed upon it as it aids in placement of the cover, identifying the front, center position. It has Velcro tabs on each side that allow you to draw the material together at the bottom, making it more secure and less likely to slip off in windy conditions. Water resistance is better than I hoped for. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor stitching - falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The stitching is completely unacceptable. I have had my grill covered with this cover for approx 6 months, and the cover still looks very nice, but the stitching on the left side started coming loose within just a few weeks, and has come undone all the way from the bottom up to the top. Then this morning I noticed that the right side has started coming unstitched as well. As I said, it still looks good, the material is holding up well, but it's not sewn together properly. Too highly priced for something that is literally falling apart in just a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Janice Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny (and the grill too)
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 3 - 4 burner from Char Broil, then you NEED this. Save your grill from the elements and keep it protected. I love grilling and honestly, I'm so glad I have this. It fits well, although I kind of wish you could cinch it at the bottom a little more tightly. Overall, however, a great buy and a great investment to keep your grill clean from the elements. (We had a few storms in the midwest recently, and this thing not only stayed put, but also really kept the grill in tip-top shape.)
customer_reviews.author: boots2passes

customer_reviews.title: Tore after one year, but Charbroil provided credit towards replacement :-(
customer_reviews.text: 2018 Update. Charbroil offered a substantial discount towards buying a new more durable cover. I will review that one soon. In the meantime, we appreciated the opportunity to replace the cover at a discounted price. We have been very happy with the replacement. Tried to contact Charbroil re: warranty and have not heard back from them. Bought it July 2, 2017. Until it tore we thought this cover was awesome. Looks brand new and has a 16" tear on it. Until it tore it protected the grill very well. The grill is in great shape. We want to keep protecting the grill as we entertain quite a bit and the guests love our Charbroil Performance Grill.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Cajun

customer_reviews.title: It covers your grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Char-Broil Performance series 3 burner with the side trays. It fits nicely and love the look of it. I have had plastic/vinyl covers in the past and so far love the feel of this material, the previous ones I had felt like they were melting in the summer and frozen in the winter making it difficult to remove and replace. This one gets warm but still easy to remove and replace.
customer_reviews.author: North Ga Family

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this cover is A+++!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 70" Char-Broil 4-burner grill. This is a thick heavy duty cover, so formed for my grill that it fits all the curves and angles, yet glides on easily and with the weight of the fabric, it hangs well and I know it's not going to blown away like the cheapie store bought one I purchased in the past. Also, it's going to protect the grill from winter weather, which is my goal because now I don't have to wheel the oversized grill onto my covered porch to take up space. I am exceptionally pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia N. Salaneck

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Cover - Don't Spend More!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover for my Char-Broil Charcoal Grill (not gas - noted this because the description states '5+ burner'). Fits like it was made for it. Very heavy weight material - will not tear easy. Has gone through several rain storms thus far - keeps the grill 100% dry. For the price, actually any price - it has been perfect. The velcro straps on the sides keeps tension on the cover so it will be less likely to lift off in a wind storm (has one of those too - did great). Nothing bad to say - great choice so far - let's see how it handles winter.
customer_reviews.author: johnthebaker

customer_reviews.title: Bad cover and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill cover last season. Already has multiple rips and fading. I contacted charbroil 2 weeks ago about it. I spoke to someone through online chat but I did not have the item number with me at the time so they told me they created me a profile and to call with the item number and they would help me out. When I got home I called back and spoke to someone else now saying there’s nothing they can do. They then told me a manager would be contacting me within 24 hours to help resolve the problem. Two weeks later, still waiting for the call I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Casper3344

customer_reviews.title: FLAW IN THE SEAM?
customer_reviews.text: Seam torn on the minute I put cover on. Unfortunately I threw away packaging and am unable to return. Apparently there was a flaw in the seam. Maybe I will be fortunate enough for Char-Broil to see this and rectify the problem. Looking for someone with a sewing machine to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a two burner grill from Maker's Mark (Sam's Club). I was a little worried about the size and if the cover would fit my grill. I am very happy with the fit, and surprised at the good quality of the material used.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R. Baellow

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an all weather cover
customer_reviews.text: With how crazy the last few months have been weather wise, I have really put this cover through the ringer. It's been in temperatures ranging from 10 degrees to 85 degrees, in sun, rain, sleet, snow, and heavy winds. My grill hasn't been touched by any of it.
customer_reviews.author: curtis lewis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit older two burner Char Broil grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like my old Char Broil grill cover that I bought with my grill about 6 years ago. It finally gave out after too much time in the California sun. I specifically ordered the Char Broil brand cover despite it costing twice as much as others because I expected to have another great cover. But the material is much flimsier and it is too snug to go on the grill easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frap

customer_reviews.title: It is a good, durable cover and if it fit
customer_reviews.text: Check the size of your grill before ordering. It is a good, durable cover and if it fit, I would have given it 5 stars. Unfortunately, I did not measure and my husband did not tell me it was too small until after we used it and threw all the packaging away, or I would have returned it--ONLY because it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: threeperros

customer_reviews.title: Huge for a 3 burner grill.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 3 burner grill, this cover was HUGE on it but we decided to keep the cover anyways. Even with the velcro straps on the side, it was still quite large and draped all the way to the ground.... living in the south, you don't want dark places for things to live under. We ended up having geckos, black widows and other critters living under the excess material. I tucked it up so it isn't draping all over the ground and now no critters are living under it.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits as described. Looks good. So far, has held up to rain and snow on the deck. Fits snug at the base with velcro. This one seems to be made with sturdy fabric. 3.21.17 Update: The cover has come through the winter on the deck in great shape. No cracking or fading. We've had some very windy weather, and the fabric has held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JGirl54

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry...its got you covered!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized cover for a two burner bbq grill without being too snug or too big. I purchased this from the Amazon Warehouse and while the product description said "used, may have some blemishes", when I got the box and opened it, I found a perfectly new (or like new) grill cover with no issues. The grill cover has two velcro straps at the bottom to keep the cover snug on the bottom of the grill and help keep it from flying off in high wind. The material is soft enough not to scratch or be abrasive, but does protect the grill. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my Broil King Baron 4-burner grill. The BK cover didn't get very good reviews. So, I wanted to get something that would do a better job of protecting my new grill. That was almost 3 years ago. This cover is still doing it's job! No tears, no holes, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Caveman Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cover is good
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover but does not completely cover to ground as shown in picture. I have a Char-Broil 3 burner grill.it will cover the the important part of the grill. Bottom of legs and wheels exposed. Velcro tie-downs keep cover in place during storms.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan O.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover just wish it was longer
customer_reviews.text: the photo shows this without seeing any feet visible from the bottom of the grill cover. That is not the case for ours. About a foot is exposed at the bottom. This was the size and style recommended for our grill (gas 2 coal/red grill) on the charbroil website. So I was disappointed on that note. However so far it has stayed in place. Is a medium weight so I don't think the wind can blow it off. It's a nice true black and looks like still.
customer_reviews.author: MB_Georgia

customer_reviews.title: It fit my 2 burner just fine
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty hefty material and I'm hoping it will last since it'll catch the daily Hawaii sun. It easily slides over the grill and the hook and loops don't take much time at all to attach. It's just a tad oversize but I can live with that instead of too tight a fit and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Guy

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: What a value. Material is heavy enough, and seams are well stitched. Previous covers tended to blow off in the wind, but this one has remained in place through some heavy storms. Felt I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Juanh

customer_reviews.title: This cover works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is good for keeping the dust, rain and general yuck off of your BBQ. We have been using this now for months. It is heavy and well made. I still have to remind my husband to put it back one when the grill is cool or I just have to do it myself. It is a bit heavy but that is why it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Pullin

customer_reviews.title: Holds up in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I had this cover for three years of direct sun before it started showing any wear. I got rid of it because I tore it moving the grill and the tear was too big to be repaired. I bought a less expensive grill cover that faded within three months. Now I'm buying another of one of these that I know will last.
customer_reviews.author: SamC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my small grill and now I can finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my small grill and now I can finally place it outside without the grill being affected by the elements. Has sinch velcro on bottom. Mine is a two burner, stainless Thermos brand grill. It is Thermos brand, but made by Char-Broil. UPDATE: You get what you pay for and I'm aware these covers dont last forever, but it should probably last more than two years. It is falling apart at the seams and will ne thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this cover
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side the cover fits my 3 burner infrared grill very well. On the negative it is ripped in the corner in less than a month. Seriously terrible abrasion resistance. I'm not happy I spent even just $16, now I have to go buy the $30+ rip stop version and I'm nearly $50 deep in covers just to get something that will hopefully last.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and width, short a few inches at the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect width but a little short on the bottom! Does the job though, great price. A slightly longer one is double the price. They didn't include the height measurement in the listing only the width. It is Charbroil Brand, so if I get a few years out of it I'll be happy. The sun just eats these up after a few years so it is what it is! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: We're are extremely pleased with this cover
customer_reviews.text: We're are extremely pleased with this cover! Sometimes we judge buy price but this time went with the less expensive choice. This is heavy duty yet easy to put on the grill. It has velcro latches on each side to keep in place. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: How to avail warranty if any?
customer_reviews.text: Just in one month of use it is shredding like paper. Total money wasted. My grill is also in a covered location hence I was not expecting such issue. If anyone knows how to avail warranty on it let me know. Amazon window just got closed for me.
customer_reviews.author: VikSin

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Cover I Have Owned
customer_reviews.text: This cover is fabulous. Is made out of a durable material to help prevent rips when putting it on and removing it. In addition, it has Velcro at the bottom on both sides so you can tighten it up around the bottom of the grill. This makes it stay snug in the highest of Northeastern winds. Fits by Char Broil 4 burner grill perfectly. A little more money, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NY Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last one month
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 30 days and just noticed it has a large tear in the seem. I would like to request a replacement or something that will last longer without tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3-burner Grill-Master propane grill and have been through a number of low-cost covers which have torn and worn out much too quickly. This Char-Broil cover was the perfect size and fit, and far better quality than anything I have seen in the price range. The velcro straps are easier to use and more effective than the cheap draw-strings on other covers. It stays on securely even in strong wind, repels rain, and looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover fits our Char-Broul girl perfectly and keeps it safe during the seasons! Also has little Velcro things on either side so once it is over the grill it can be tightened to let the least amount of air in. I highly recommend purchasing this as it will keep your grill safe during the fall/spring/winter
customer_reviews.author: Sams_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill cover. This is made well and is holding up so far. My last one I ordered was thin and lasted about two seasons:( The price was very reasonable and that’s how it should be for this kind of item. Happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. It is custom made for our Char-Broil Grill and is holding up very well. We have had it now for a few months and it has survived the New England winter with flying colors. We also live where it is windy almost all of the time, lots of open fields around us, and the velcro on this cover has held tight and not allowed the cover to fly off or loosen up at all. I would recommend it if you are looking for a good reliable cover.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Judge

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Large size and fit our grill. I'm excited to see how it does in the snow but it's great through rain and has enough weight to last through plenty of wind especially due to the sides that tighten with Velcro. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David and Kay-Marie Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Quality Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this grill cover because of the cheap price.. A couple years ago I cheaped out on a grill cover that I bought at a local discount store and it was a piece of crap and didn't last 2 months. I was afraid this might be the same. However I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this cover when it arrived. It's a quality product, definitely recommended..
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor fit/quality
customer_reviews.text: Cover much too big for my 3 burner despite being advertised as the cover for 3/4 burner grills. Wind whipped it around even with Velcro straps secured. Seam ripped out after 6 weeks. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: lepreshaun

customer_reviews.title: ... burner gas grill (+1 side burner) and it's a perfect fit. When I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recently for my Char-Broil® SignatureTM 3 burner gas grill (+1 side burner) and it's a perfect fit. When I ordered it, it was $17. Since receiving it I've been very impressed. It's sturdy and not a flimsy material which is what I was expecting at this price point. Also, it doesn't hang too low or high with my grill. If you have the same grill or a similar one, I highly recommend this cover since its a great bang for the buck. Lastly, since getting it, it has withstood two snowstorms with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value!!
customer_reviews.text: For under $20, this thing looks perfect. My family and neighbors think that it came with my Char Broil 3-burner grill. Velcro straps on the side help keep it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing grill cover! It's a very heavy duty material that won't tear. I've had one before and I'm so glad I found it again. It fits my 4 burner Charbroil grill perfectly. I would have rated it 5 but I want to see how it holds up against fading first. Not a big deal to me, since protecting my grill is my goal.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: This Product will Not Hold Up in Direct Sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover 11 months ago, it has already become unusable. The surface that faces the sun has turned hard and brittle, when I touch it it falls apart. ...You know it's like that cheap plastic that has turned stiff and fragile as rice paper. Good Price but Not Worth it. Look else ware
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever been compelled to write a review on Amazon, but felt I had to. I can't stress this enough. Do not buy this junk. I bought one of these in 2016 after getting a grill. It lasted about a year and then began to rip. Thought, OK, maybe it was me. So bought another one in 2018. And here we are again with another torn to shreds cover. This thing is garbage. You'll get a good year out of it. Maybe a little bit more. That's it. DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK. I should have learned my lesson the first time. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: JMurdoch84

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice cover. The material is strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: It fits our grill perfectly. I bought this grill cover because it was large enough to cover our grill. So far it has held up to the weather. It comes with to velcro straps on each side so you can tighten the cover down. I wish it had something to attach the cover to the grill itself, but it is a nice cover. The material is strong and durable. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: No surprises. It was exactly what I ordered. ...
customer_reviews.text: No surprises. It was exactly what I ordered. The last one lasted 4 full seasons before it faded and ripped. Living in the northeast we get harsh winters and hot summers. It did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: The price is cheaper than stores but this one also lasted 13 months compared to others I’ve purchased in the past that last for years. For some reason this ripped after we had a windy weekend. It didn’t get caught on anything I think the fabric was worn down by the elements. It did fit nicely and worked great but don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.author: R. Bing

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Mine ripped after only 4 weeks outside. i'm using it with a 4 burner Charboil grill. I've seen other complaints about the fit and i have to agree that it's not tapered enough at the bottom. Even with the velcro straps in use, it moves around in the wind, which is likely why it tore on the edges. I'd recommend something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Glennon

customer_reviews.title: It was nice for a while
customer_reviews.text: It was nice for a while, after a few light windy days the top side seam has come undone & torn cleanly offf. That's not something you want to see off an all-weather cover... CHAR-BROIL fix this & make it right !
customer_reviews.author: H. Pozos

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this for his new grill and is happy with the thickness of the fabric. I took off a star because one of the hook/loop closure tabs came off when he tugged it. I sewed it back on and also secured the other 3 tabs, which looked like they were about to come off, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a 5 star cover! I chose this cover because of the reviews and so far they were right. It fits my 4 burner gas grill that also has a side burner very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as promised Prime 2 day shipping. Exellent quality at a great price. I shopped around online and this price was significantly lower than Walmart and other retailers. I gave this product 5 stars because the quality is very durable, well made and the price was below other retailers. I thought it was a great bargain. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: After less than 1 year. Does NOT last
customer_reviews.text: After less than 1 year of use. Rips are all over the place. Very disappointed. Will not buy again. See pictures. You would think the grill maker themselves would have top quality accessories. Not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Value
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely on my CB Performance 4 burner w/fixed side and burner shelves. Grill Dim 26"D x 53"W x 45" H. Seems to be a good value, and well made, plus it has a cool printed Logo. Time will tell how long it will last. Cover came in in original CB packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tomintx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover perfectly fits the 4 burner Char-Broil grill with a side burner. The box lists the grill dimensions as nearly 27" wide and I was struggling to find a cover that was wide enough. This one is great! And it's $15 cheaper here than in stores. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover. Fits perfectly and super affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Super flexible and glides over the grill when putting it on. Velcro straps at the base have helped numerous times to keep it on securely in windy times. Color hasn't faded yet and the emblem helps make sure I put it on right. Quality cover and the price was impossible to beat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Dulac

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 3 burner Charboil grill nicely
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Really easy to remove and to put back on. It's not a heavy canvas like my last one - but that one was a beast to get on and off, so I didn't grill as often as I now do. I live in Florida and the sun tears up everything, so will probably have to replace it next year or so. Have had some pretty high winds and torrential downpours and no problems! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: pss

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: thought I was getting some quality, I should have listened to the reviews, the stichting bad. coming apart already after two weeks. I would suggest getting something different. I have bought a lot of items on here, and this is the first one that I have had a issue with. Just buy a different cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted one season
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit well, but didn't last a year. There are multiple places where the cover has torn. The material seems very stiff and brittle after just one winter. I don't think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not too durable
customer_reviews.text: The cover is water resistant, but the quality and durability isnt that good. I bought this Feb 2018 and it started ripping in September 2019. It just couldn't hold up in this great California weather.
customer_reviews.author: ToneB

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Ripped almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to cover my Blackstone griddle. And if you understand that griddle you know it MUST not sit with water on it. This thing ripped after three or four times of being taken off then put back on. For the money this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fraczek

customer_reviews.title: This cover is useless
customer_reviews.text: Material is shoddy, just a plastic cover... worth 5 bucks maybe. Not UV resistant, tears easily. I threw it away and bought a real cover. Don't waste your money on this branded crap.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeHavoc

customer_reviews.title: Bought it last year and used it over the winter ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it last year and used it over the winter. I brought he grill out for a cookout over the weekend and when I took it off, I already noticed many spots of sunlight shining through the cover. Although it still appears to be weather proof, I expected a cover to make it at least one season before seeing holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: High quality and heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and it hasn't yet been through any weather 'conditions' but first impression is high quality and heavy duty material. It fits over my char-broil 2 burner grill perfectly with velcro closures at the bottom to keep out the wind/elements. Will see how it ages and report back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I did like it and it did cover my grill. The only issue for me is I had the cover on for 3 days and it tore. In the products defense I do live in an extremely windy area. The winds can get up to over 65MPH. I guess one day the wind pulled the cover the right way and it tore the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ara

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived it great condition. It fits my grill perfectly. So far, so good. We will see how it does against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my Kenmore 2 burner patio grill. Fits a little large, but not too bad. Does a good job so far keeping out the rain and retaining its color. The price was right and I gave it a try. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: AC79VA

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill cover it fits the grill like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Good grill cover, fit the grill well, it seems to be well made and good price the last cover I bought another brand didn't last dried up and fell apart this one is made of different material hopefully it holds up to the weather better. I recommend this I would by it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Well made solid cover at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This cover is really solid and well made at a great price. Have spent more on covers that are more flimsy. This is the one! There are two adjustable strap (velcro) on both sides to make a better fit (so it doesn't just lifted off by the wind). Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: vball4fun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Stood up to the snow, rain, sleet and hail storms. Very thick good quality & drawstring at the bottom to secure it. I have a 3 burner gas grill with an extra side burner and it fit perfectly!! A MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit My Grill/Useless for Me
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit my grill despite the detailed dimensions of the product. Now I would like to return the product and according to the site, I can't despite the perfect, new condition. Please assist.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm18

customer_reviews.title: Char-Broil 2-3 Burner All-Season Cover fits Weber Q320 Grill.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Weber Q320 Grill Cover that isn't manufactured anymore.. It fits my Weber Q320 nicely with the side tables folded down. Not a real tight fit, but the Velcro straps on the sides cinch it nice and snug so the wind won't blow it off. Looks like good quality and the price was great compared to other covers.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A.- Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: These become brittle pretty quickly and then the material tears on the BBQ edges. So it won’t last more than two seasons, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckmenlo

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: It has ripped. I'll attempt to repair it but I don't hold out much hope. It's supposed to be outside in all kinds of nasty weather so I assume that's not the issue. I really liked the material and was disappointed with its lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: cdog

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grill in my back yard, after replacing one that got all torn up after only a few months and was not providing protection anymore. Put this one on, and have not sense had a problem with any rips or tears or otherwise. It is easy to take off and put on and has no once come off when I did not want it to. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RemmeM

customer_reviews.title: It works and fits perfect and is great quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed a grill cover until I got this. This is a must have not only for wet weather but for dust and dirt. It works and fits perfect and is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: jessi karzen

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the grill like new
customer_reviews.text: I live in Portland and thus keeps the grill looking new and I'm sure it will make it last longer. The dude Velcro strips endure a good fit around the base too.How many rusted out grills do you see at the edge of the road in the early summer!? It's worth the small price to protect the grill. Be sure to measure your grill and trays before picking the size.
customer_reviews.author: Rich R. Rainbolt

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it was made for my bbq.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick material. Heavy enough to beat windy days and not blow off. If your bbq has 3 burners, another side burner, and a side shelf on the other side, this is the cover you'll want.
customer_reviews.author: N. G.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product, good weight
customer_reviews.text: Received order two days earlier than expected. This is an excellent product, good weight, I inspected all the seams, this is a well put together cover. I hope to have many years of service from this cover.
customer_reviews.author: JamesL43

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It got a big ole split in it but to be fair it has been almost 2 years since I got it so I reckon I got my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of bbq equipments and Char-broil makes the best covers of any I own. Not only do the remain pliable on cold weather, they don’t crack. They hold up for several year. I buy them even for my non char-broil equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Roland The Magnificent

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced name-brand product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product for a similar price point of an economy-cover at a Big Box Store. Fit my Charbroil Performance 4 Burner propane grill well.
customer_reviews.author: A. DiPasquale

customer_reviews.title: This was a huge upgrade to our previous cover, and cost LESS.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our torn generic one....was shocked at how seemingly high quality this one is. And it's legit Char-Broil Brand. Thus far, no concerns....this was a huge upgrade to our previous cover, and cost LESS.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: Updated: not waterproof and tore after 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: It fits the grill. After a heavy rain, I lifted the lid the next day to use the grill and there was water on the top of the grill... so not waterproof as I'd hoped. Update: After 6 mo the seam along the top back of the grill just came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Good cover. It is the typical cover
customer_reviews.text: Good cover. It is the typical cover, just a light water repent material. If you are looking for a thinker heavier cover then keep looking. This is perfect for our grill and what we were looking for. Seems to be keeping the water/rain out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndzy79

customer_reviews.title: After about 6 months the sun broke it down enough to where is easily tears when handling
customer_reviews.text: The sun started fading it in the first month. After about 6 months the sun broke it down enough to where is easily tears when handling.
customer_reviews.author: D. Go

customer_reviews.title: Sides need to be folded to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like good quality. It fits well and has Velcro on the bottom to hug it. You will need to fold down the sides on the charbroil 2 burner for this to fit! However it does fit nice and snug!
customer_reviews.author: PhoneExpert

customer_reviews.title: Stitching ripped in less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: Great size and material, covers well, but I have only had this two months and it has a huge rip in the side stitching as others have reported also. Overall disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed of extremely inferior fabric!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is junk! After one mild winter it had several holes in the fabric. After a second winter it is completely unusable - large holes in the fabric and torn seams, nothing has come in contact to damage it, the cover just literally fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: J Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... pricing but I bought at $25 which doesn't seem like much to keep the new grill covered
customer_reviews.text: I didn't research covers very much so I can't compare pricing but I bought at $25 which doesn't seem like much to keep the new grill covered. It fits very well with the new Char Broil 6 burner grill and is easy to put on and take off. The quality is great it is very thick. I reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It fits nice and looks good. But it leaves marks on my grill from “sticking” to the stainless. I’m not impressed by this. Imagine a car cover doing this. I would be livid. Not sure what the remedy is, but I hope these marks clean off. A wet rag didn’t get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash after 2 NJ Seasons.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 summers then the weight of itself caused tears in all 4 corners. After the first summer i noticed the material started to stiffen up and due to this it weakened the corners causing tears. Would give 0 Stars but that's not an option. This item is suppose to last since its made to be used outdoors. Very disappointed. Would NOT Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Synn69

customer_reviews.title: Tore in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the exact grill it is built for, and it tore within 3 months- going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Covers 2 burner grills very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on a Nexgrill 2-burner infrared grill with the side tables down. it has cinches on the side bottom if you want it to fit tighter. It is easy to get over the grill. I like this because it keeps the rain out and does not seem to have problems with condensation. Before this cover, I had a thicker Char-Broil grill cover that would from its own condensation under the cover, causing the grill to be constantly wet.
customer_reviews.author: Big-G

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Me and my sister have the same grill so I bought 2. One for me and one for her it works good preference wise I would've liked for the straps to be able to get a little tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Tree

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in April 2019. I just went outside to remove the cover and fire up the grill. The cover stuck to the top of the grill and ripped. I have noticed in the past that the cover sticks when I remove it but tonight it ripped. I do not put the cover on until the grill is completely cool. Two pics are of the ripped cover, 1 pic is the inside of the cover that stuck to the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Small tears after 2 months. Completely shredded after 18 months. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: cly

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my Designer series nice and comfy thru the long winter months. Lasts about two years and then ready for replacement. Good value all around.
customer_reviews.author: Making things simple

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but only lasted 17 months
customer_reviews.text: The cover was only $17 dollars, so I can't complain too much, but the material is stiff, even when it's warm out, and it ripped after 17 months. So you get about a month per dollar.
customer_reviews.author: TAR2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product cannot withstand the weather it is tearing apart. Maybe it has not been tested for Florida sun
customer_reviews.author: Lisane

product_meta.title: Char-Broil 2 Burner All-Season Cover
product_meta.description: Size:2 BurnerMedium-duty grill cover protects your grill against damage from the elements. Designed to fit grills with 2 burners, up to 32-inches wide. 300D polyester material with PVC inner coating. Convenient side closure straps keep cover securely fastened.
feature_bullets: Medium-duty grill cover protects your grill against damage from the elements
Designed to fit grills with 2 burners, up to 32-inches wide
300D polyester material with PVC inner coating
Convenient side closure straps keep cover securely fastened

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,731 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
